achievements: Enhanced RoboGPT by developing new functionalities for food preparation tasks.
Integrated a vision stack to improve the accuracy of object pose detection, reducing error margins in robotic movements.
Collaborated with the Food Robotics team to refine and implement key processes, such as coffee preparation, within the robotic workflow.
Served as Head of Web Development for the Club Website, creating engaging content for Socials.
Contributed to the design and development of the LEAP.AI@Plaksha Club website, enhancing its functionality and user interface.
Worked closely with the team to ensure seamless integration of content and design elements across digital platforms.
Developed the club's website and event-specific pages, ensuring a seamless user experience.
Spearheaded the creation of the Club Merchandise Store, integrating it with the existing digital infrastructure.

projects.name: ResumeBuilder & InterviewGPT
projects.description: Led frontend development with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn for a mobile-first UI. Architected backend services with FastAPI, handling resume parsing and AI chat interactions. Leveraged Gemini models for real-time feedback and role-aligned resume recommendations.

projects.name: Sports Fest Site
projects.description: Designed and developed a fully responsive website for Eklavya '25, the university's annual sports fest. Ensured responsiveness across all screen sizes, optimizing accessibility for participants and viewers. Leveraged Next.js and framer-motion for buttery smooth animations and sleek page transitions.

projects.name: Basketball Scoreboard & Individual Data Tracker
projects.description: Built a real-time basketball scoreboard with a focus on speed and ease of use for scorekeepers. Improved UI after 6 months of stress testing, adding undo buttons and repositioning controls for optimal usability. Implemented real-time stats tracking for rebounds and shot accuracy, instantly displaying player performance.
